description:
* A new series developed by http://anidb.net/cr152 [Kawamori Shouji] and his http://anidb.net/cr1043 [Satelight] studio.
Mankind living on the planet Vega is threatened by a new enemy from the planet Altair whose female population was wiped out by a mysterious disease called the Curse of Eve. The Alteans using their Abductors, just like the Shadow Angels, invade the cities on Vega to kidnap its female inhabitants, looking for a way to ensure the preservation of their race.
To defend against the invasion, the http://anidb.net/ch40635 [Neo Diva] organization establishes two teams, one composed of only males and other of only females, each one piloting their own giant machines called Aquaria. To protect their new friend http://anidb.net/ch39304 [Mikono Suzushiro], teenager http://anidb.net/ch39303 [Amata Sora] makes use of the power he has kept in secret his entire life and by combining Vectors with male and female pilots into one single robot, the legendary giant Aquarion is reborn.
Source: Wikipedia
Note: Set 12,000 thousand years after the events of http://anidb.net/a2830 [Genesis of Aquarion].

REGULAR.description:
12,000 years after the battles fought by Aquarion, machines from another dimension called Abductors begin attacking the Earth and kidnapping people. Two Aquarias protect humanity from the Abductors, but then a more powerful enemy appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Myth That Holds an End
Owari o Daita Shinwateki Kinjirareta Gattai Special 1
終末[おわり]を抱いた神話的禁じられた合体スペシャル1

REGULAR.description:
During the fight, Cayenne’s element power, Despair Prediction, shows another vision of the wedding in mourning clothes. This time, he sees the faces of the bride and groom. What’s the meaning of this vision? What does it mean to the bride and groom?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Owari o Daita Shinwateki Kinjirareta Gattai Special 2
終末[おわり]を抱いた神話的禁じられた合体スペシャル2

REGULAR.description:
Although both Amata and Mikono are brought to the St. Angel Academy in Neo-DEAVA, they’re on different sides of the Berlin Wall and cannot see each other. So Amata decides to work with Andy in order to be able to see Mikono again.
Source: crunchyroll

Amata, still worried about whether or not Mikono will forgive him, meets a talented student with a strong Element power named Shrade. Meanwhile, a new attack on Vega is set into motion, and Amata, Cayenne and Andy are called into action.
Source: crunchyroll

While the Element candidates are prohibited from being in a romantic relationship, they are divided into mixed-gender, three-person groups in their field trip. This activity is part of their training, but what is the purpose of this strange arrangement?
Source: crunchyroll

After heading to Vega once again, Kagura finally finds Mikono and tries to kidnap her. When Amata takes Mikono and runs, Kagura further pursues her in Mithra Gnis. This time, Cayenne, Zessica and Andy are ordered to fight the Abductor.
Source: crunchyroll

Still feeling the barrier between the guys and girls even after the academy became co-ed, Andy suggests changing the seating arrangements in the classroom. When he didn’t get the arrangements he hoped, he starts talking about an Element who disappeared.
Source: crunchyroll

While digging a hole, Andy finds an ancient book and thinks that it is the legendary book called “The Book of the Twin Stars.” In the meantime, Jin gets on board the heavily armored Radius Gnis in order to mount another attack on Vega.
Source: crunchyroll

Andy says that holes are his very life. Mix states that she hates holes. In training, they’re required to merge but refuse to do so. Despite the fact that their Gattai didn’t go well during training, Fudo sends them in to a real battle.
Source: crunchyroll

Jin contacts Altair to let them know he is still alive. Izumo orders him to infiltrate Neo-DEAVA to search for a Rare Igler who can be the true Eve and also to attempt to retrieve all or part of the Mechanical Angel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lo studente trasferito da un occhio solo

REGULAR.description:
As Jin continues his infiltration of Neo-DEAVA, on Altair, Kagura’s rage over being held captive continues to grow as he pines for Mikono. Mykage encourages his rage until it boils over, and he breaks free in order to attempt to head to Vega again.
Source: crunchyroll

After finding out that Amata was unable to tell Mikono how he feels about her, Andy offers his help, suggesting a get together among friends and making plans to hold an exciting event to celebrate the St. Angel Academy’s foundation day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Danza dei Cieli di Aquaria

REGULAR.description:
During the movie showing on the night of the Academy’s foundation day, Mithra Gnis suddenly appears and beings attacking the Academy. In the meantime, Jin, who identified Yunoha as a candidate for the true Eve, tries to take her to Altair with him.
Source: crunchyroll

While mourning the lost lives, students at the academy begin to realize that they’re fighting a life-or-death battle. In order to face the battle against Altair, which is expected to further intensify, Fudo assigns the students a new training.
Source: crunchyroll

Just when the students at St. Angel Academy have completed their Grave Training, Kagura, who was sent to Vega by Mykage, shows up before them. Realizing that Kagura is after Mikono, the students try to help her escape.
Source: crunchyroll

Mikono is told that she is prohibited from leaving her dorm as punishment for defending Kagura. Alone in her room, she herself wonders why she defended him. In the meantime, Fudo proposes a new training... a real combat training between Aquarions.
Source: crunchyroll

Fudo assigns a top-secret mission to the Elements but gives them no details about their mission. While the Elements await the details of their mission, Andy summons the courage to tell Mix how he feels about her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 湧きあがれ, いのち

REGULAR.description:
The excessive use of the dimensional gate has caused Altair’s energy supplies to dwindle. Feeling that Altair is at the end of its rope, Izumo decides that he, himself, will head to Vega this time to bring back Rare Iguras.
Source: crunchyroll

Mix has been taken to Altair. While Andy is feeling down for not being able to do anything as the dimensional gate is closed, Zessica is also suffering a guilty conscious for what happened to Mix. Then, Mykage suddenly shows up in her dorm room.
Source: crunchyroll

Andy escapes from captivity and continues to look for Mix. Outside the building, Yunoha and Zessica’s condition is deteriorating for some unknown reason. In the meantime, Amata encounters Altair’s leader in the mysterious room he found his mother.
Source: crunchyroll

Although Amata and the others were able to come back from Altair safely, their mission to retrieve Mix ended in failure. While Andy deals with the frustration of not being able to get Mix back, Amata decides to go find Mikono.
Source: crunchyroll

When Amata goes back to where he first met Mikono to look for her, an Abductor appears. Shrade, Cayenne and Sazanka are deployed to fight it. In the meantime, Kagura shows up and he and Amata fight as Mikono begs them to stop.
Source: crunchyroll

Following Kagura and Mikono, Amata, Zessica and Shrade enter the dimensional gate. However, they become adrift in the dimensional gap. Meanwhile, Fudo and Crea explain the myth passed down for twenty-four thousand years.
Source: crunchyroll

The Mythic Aquarion finally awakens in response to Kagura’s call. Boarding the Mythic Aquarion along with Mikono and Zessica, Kagura pilots the Mythic Aquarion and fights Izumo and Mix in order to keep them from taking Mikono away from him.
Source: crunchyroll

After his parents die as a result of Kagura’s attack, Amata becomes furious at Kagura, his other half, and attacks him using an incomplete form of Aquarion. Meanwhile, Andy continues to try hard to get Mix’s memory back.
Source: crunchyroll

A dark Aquarion controlled by Mykage has appeared in front of Amata and the others. In order to stop the two planets and all life from being destroyed, Amata and the others must defeat the dark version of Solar Wing.
Source: crunchyroll

2778.name: slow when it comes to love
